item.title: Softwares and web
item.description: These softwares and web services are widely used in makers projects. They are open source, and most don’t require signing up. Linux Debian Ubuntu an Operative System https://www.ubuntu.com/desktop Inkscape a Vector Graphics Editor https://inkscape.org FreeCad a parametric 3D modeler https://www.freecadweb.org Fritzing an Electronic Design Automation http://fritzing.org/ Saas Create an App to connect to Bluetooth connected board: App Builder MITApp http://ai2.appinventor.mit.edu/ Upload code directly from web based Arduino editor IDE https://create.
